name: SpaceWars (QueteGames)
description:
Overview:

You're a pilot of a space ship who needs to kill "The Desturctor" a big mother ship who wants to destroy the galaxy whit his army of space warships.

Power Ups:

Two different power ups that can be combined!!!

Enemies:

Four differents types of enemies with his own attacks and mechanics and one final boss.

Made by: 

Tomas Fernandez (Me :D)

Disclaimer:

This game was made as a project for a programming class, The design is flawed but i've learnt a lot from this game and im quite happy with what we've made.
